scripts.release:patch: git switch master && npm version patch && git switch release && git merge master --ff-only && git push --follow-tags && git switch master && git push
scripts.release:minor: git switch master && npm version minor && git switch release && git merge master --ff-only && git push --follow-tags && git switch master && git push
scripts.release:major: git switch master && npm version major && git switch release && git merge master --ff-only && git push --follow-tags && git switch master && git push
